peripheralPage.name: _instance

binaryOption.name: smc_pmprot_ahsrun
binaryOption.toolTip: This write-once field allows the MCU to enter High Speed Run mode (HSRUN).

binaryOption.name: smc_pmprot_avlp
binaryOption.toolTip: This write-once bit allows the MCU to enter any very low power modes: VLPR, VLPW, and VLPS

peripheralPage.template: \t// Power Mode Protection Register \tstatic constexpr uint8_t pmprot = \t SMC_PMPROT_AHSRUN($(smc_pmprot_ahsrun:0)) | // Allow High Speed Run mode \t SMC_PMPROT_AVLP($(smc_pmprot_avlp:0)); // Allow very low power modes\n\n

choiceOption.name: smc_stopctrl_stopo
choiceOption.toolTip: These bits control whether a Partial Stop mode is entered when STOPM=STOP

choice.name: STOP1 - Partial Stop with both system and bus clocks disabled
STOP2 - Partial Stop with system clock disabled and bus clock enabled

peripheralPage.template: \t// VLLS Control Register \tstatic constexpr uint8_t stopctrl = \t SMC_STOPCTRL_STOPO($(smc_stopctrl_stopo:0)); // Partial Stop Option\n\n
